interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.EnergyUsage
interface.description: Interface that exposes information on Energy consumption of the device.

property.name: CumulativeEnergy
property.description: The cumulative energy consumption of the device in kWHr.

property.name: Precision
property.description: The precision of the CumulativeEnergy property. i.e. the number of kWHr the actual energy consumption must change before CumulativeEnergy is updated.

property.name: UpdateMinTime
property.description: The minimum time between updates of the CumulativeEnergy property in milliseconds

method.name: ResetCumulativeEnergy
method.description: Resets the value of CumulativeEnergy to 0
